Here are just a few things this legislation will do: pic.twitter.com/Simbfu6krx

Bottom line: you shouldn’t have to choose between paying your monthly bills and paying for your prescription drugs. 

H.R.3 can lower price costs for Texans with breast cancer, prostate cancer, arthritis, HIV/AIDS, and diabetes! 

It’s time for #LowerDrugCosts. RT if you agree.

I’m proud to join my colleagues later today to pass this bill that will include legislation I authored with @RepMaxRose @Repjoemorelle to expand access to programs that reduce Medicare out-of-pocket costs for low-income individuals. pic.twitter.com/x6xyVE8cxh
